parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name/>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Vectors </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Render Time Scope </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return object's normalized direction vector in world space (<tt>[x,y,z]</tt>) in render time scope. 
* A unit facing North would return <tt>[0,1,0]</tt>
* A unit facing East would return <tt>[1,0,0]</tt>
* A unit facing South would return <tt>[0,-1,0]</tt>
* A unit facing West would return <tt>[-1,0,0]</tt> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''vectorDirVisual''' objectName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> objectName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [[Vector3D]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_dirVector = [[vectorDirVisual]] _unit;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[vectorModelToWorldVisual]], [[vectorDir]], [[vectorUpVisual]], [[vectorUp]], [[setVectorDir]], [[setVectorUp]], [[setVectorDirAndUp]], [[vectorDiff]], [[vectorAdd]], [[vectorMultiply]], [[vectorCrossProduct]], [[vectorDistance]], [[vectorMagnitudeSqr]], [[vectorDistanceSqr]], [[vectorCos]], [[vectorMagnitude]], [[vectorDotProduct]], [[vectorNormalized]], [[vectorFromTo]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
